segments.text: So , Paula , where are you from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From Canada ? Where were you born ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you come to Los Angeles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We moved here when I was fourteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you go to school here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I went to high school here , but I went to college in Texas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you get a job right after graduation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I traveled for a while in Europe after college , and then I lived in France .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see ... That was about six years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bet that was interesting . What did you do there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I studied French . Anyway ... that's enough about me.How about you ? Were you born in L . A . ?
segments.speaker: S2
